Well for one, You wont be able to get on a plane with any sort of weapon! E=
specially a sword! Next, I would like to know how you were able to go to Ja=
pan to teach English? I would like to do that as well!
=C2=A0
As for how Ja=
panese treat "gaijin" They ae the nicest people on the planet!! You have NO=
THING to worry about!! Trust me! I am half Japanese and I know my relatives=
!
=C2=A0
John
